post.author: doomer145
post.body: A few days ago, I purchased a "e-GeForce 6200" video card (256 mb). Since then, whenever I go into DoomEdit and make a common brush, it will look all glitchy and messed up in 3D mode (they vanish or look all blurry). Same goes for entities and everything else to. This makes it very hard for me to make maps. So I'm wondering, is there anyway to fix this, like a setting or something?

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: I had a problem with that card as well, I had a geforce 6200 128mb, awhile back and when I first started up the editor things were rendered improperly and until I went into realtime render mode and went back to standard view, it would correct iteself.

post.author: doomer145
post.body: Yeah, that does fix it. Thanks.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: huh, I thought I was the only one with that problem, I guess 6200's are inferior for doomedit.
